last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 5
last_episode_to_air.overview: Joe has finally uncovered the truth at the heart of recent events, but the threat to those closest to him has never been more real.

name: The Suspect
overview:
Doctor Joseph O'Loughlin a man who appears to have the perfect life and a successful career as a clinical psychologist.

But nothing can be taken for granted, even the most flawless existence is only a loose thread away from unravelling.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When successful psychologist Joe O'Loughlin is asked by the police to assist in the case of a murdered young woman, ghosts from his past begin to resurface.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Joe's wife desperately wants him to focus on his health, but he just can't get the murdered woman out of his head. He's convinced there's something sinister at play.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Things look bleak for Joe as he embarks on his own investigation while the police continue theirs. Joe unearths details which lead him uncomfortably close to home.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Desperate to uncover the truth, Joe finds himself on the run. In a final attempt to understand that is happening to him, Joe must dig deep into the past, including his own.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Joe has finally uncovered the truth at the heart of recent events, but the threat to those closest to him has never been more real.
